name: Rogue Madness
description:
My wife and I developed this roguelike game during our family hackathon.

  • The game has five levels.
  • There are different enemies per level.
  • You will level up when you kill an enemy.
  • Enemies level up every ten turns.
  • You need to find enemies and kill them as soon as possible otherwise, they will kill you.

Controls:

  • Use WASD to move.
  • Drag&Drop to equip loot.
